alert.note: Alert for Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 6:07AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ocean and eastern Monmouth Counties through 645 AM EDT... At 606 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Keansburg to 6 miles south of Seaside Heights. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Sandy Hook, Lakewood, Middletown, Howell, Barnegat, Tinton Falls, Holmdel, Red Bank, Beachwood, Keansburg, Manasquan, Point Pleasant Beach, Tuckerton, Seaside Heights, Farmingdale, Surf City and Mantoloking. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 27 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 59 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth
